name: jake-claude-code-plugins
description: Local collection of Claude Code plugins

plugins.name: ddd-expert
plugins.description: Domain-Driven Design guidance grounded in Eric Evans' Blue Book

plugins.name: git-commits
plugins.description: Writes high-quality Git commit messages following Conventional Commits and best practices

plugins.name: optimizing-plugins
plugins.description: Adds an /optimizing-plugin skill for creating, auditing, and optimizing Claude Code plugins

plugins.name: optimizing-skills
plugins.description: Applies Anthropic's best practices for Claude Code skills. Use when creating, reviewing, or optimizing skills.

plugins.name: token-counter
plugins.description: Provides exact token counts using Anthropic's Token Counting API. Triggers when users ask about token counts for text, files, or images.
